name: Spanish-style Chicken & Rice
ingredientLines: 1 Tbsp. olive oil or vegetable oil
1/2 lb. sweet Italian sausage links, cut into 1-inch pieces*
1 medium red or green bell pepper, diced (1 cup)
1 cup frozen green peas, partially thawed
1 package Knorr® Fiesta Sides™ - Mexican Rice
